website_summaries.verdict: A crowd-pleaser...even for people with sensitive skin
pros: Mask is great for shrinking and tightening pores
Product applies easily and smells rather pleasant, leaving skin noticeably soft after an application
Includes moisturizing ingredients like shea butter, aloe vera juice, and jojoba oil
cons: A few users complained of breakouts...make sure to do a skin patch test first

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I used to try in the past different ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I used to try in the past different mud mask , but this one My skin love it , i have a sensitive oily skin . And it left my skin soft and zero oil. My husban always hate face mask , but finnaly i found this one and he like it.
customer_reviews.author: Khadija

customer_reviews.title: Product burned my skin!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I wouldn't consider my skin overly sensitive. I have tried a lot of different products from various places. With the mask-- My pores did seem to shrink with the product. However-- After my first use as directed, my face was red, warm and tender exactly where I put the product. I have never had any product do this to my skin, ever. I'm super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: laa laa

customer_reviews.title: Wife loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my wife while she was on deployment, she absolutely loved it,... made her feel like a girl again, she said. ☺
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Smells wonderful! I have rosacea and this did not irritate my skin - left it very smooth and soft. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my face feels amazing after using it
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed clearer skin, but I do still have blocked pores. Either way, my face feels amazing after using it. I will still buy this in the future. Also one jar, last a LONG time - which I love!
customer_reviews.author: Mareeka

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I started using this my face feels so much better. I also started exfoliating and using witch hazel on a semi regular basis and my complexion has improved dramatically. I really love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: L.E.D.

customer_reviews.title: Good good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I spent hours looking for face masks and finally settled on this one after reading dozens of positive reviews. No I wanna add to that list! This is probably the best face mask I’ve ever used. I’ve had deeply clogged pores that resulted in what I thought would be permanent blockheads allllllll over my nose. However, even after one use, my pores looked noticeably cleaner and smaller. Miracle product.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Tucker

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The girls and I had facials tonight and laughed at how goofy we looked. Our faces felt pretty good afterward so the product seems to be fine. No rash or bad after effects so I'll take that as a win! Also, it didn't smell bad, either!
customer_reviews.author: hartmanfamilyof10

customer_reviews.title: My face feels awesome :)
customer_reviews.text: This mud mask is great, and really made my skin feel fabulous, although I would definitely use a moisturizer as it suggests since it leaves your face a little dry. The recommended dry time is 5 minutes, but it takes a little longer than that to dry. Great product, you can use it multiple times before running out(recommended 2x a week).
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: First time buyer
customer_reviews.text: Came across this product looking stuff to help with my horrible oily skin after reading the reviews decided to by it i received it fast because i have prime i use a flat foundation brush to apply it a few people say it stain your rags i used my microfiber makeup remover ones and it washes right out so i guess it just depends on what you use anyway my skin looks and feel amazing and i have super super sensitive skin so i know this stuff is pure because i would have broken out asap otherwise definitely will buy again ps a lil goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: jamada

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Majestic Pure Natural Dead Sea Mud Mask is a great do-it-yourself facial. It applies easily and evenly and makes your skin feel great. It's like a mini facial for a fraction of the cost!! I use it at night before I get in the shower. I also noticed how easily my night-time moisturizer applied afterwards. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: FLMomOfTwinBoys

customer_reviews.title: This mask is unique that it is not oily and ...
customer_reviews.text: This mask is unique that it is not oily and comes off without much effort and your skin feels exfoliated and baby soft. My pore size has noticeable decreased in size and I will continue using this Dead Sea Mask.
customer_reviews.author: Anne AbdTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pier cleansing
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask I’m from isreal where the Dead Sea is I’ve been there they have the mud all around some ppl put all over their bodies It is such an amazing smooth texture yeast to apply try using a mask spatula it’s plastic and spreads it like butter knife I try to use it every week but I started forget plus I suffer from depression sometimes don’t wanna do anything It makes ur skin smooth it has a kinda salt tingling sensation but it helps my black head dissappewr and has a radiant finish
customer_reviews.author: Tali Moskowitz

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for the first time. It felt so cool, smooth and silky just putting it on my face. I didn't glob it on. It dried quickly and didn't get that tight uncomfortable feeling you can get with most masks. I was kind of careful taking it off because other reviews said it made a mess. I sorta ALWAYS make a mess. 😆 I gently rubbed in circles, as directed, with warm water. No mess! No heavy perfume smell either. My face felt refreshed after applying my face cream. It was my first use, so I haven't noticed if it has turned back the hands of time just yet. lol I like this mask very much. Try it!!
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stuff because someone told me it was really good at removing blackheads. I used it a couple of times and didn't notice any difference. Blackheads were still there and my face wasn't any softer afterwards. Save your money and find another mask that does what it promises. Also be prepared for tons of emails from this company, they will constantly email you asking how you're liking the product. I ended up returning this product for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Really Cleans Your Face, Softens your Skin, and Clears Your Pores
customer_reviews.text: This mask is very good at cleaning your pores and smoothing out your skin. I recommend using it once a week to keep zits at bay and to improve the appearance of your facial skin. Don't keep it on your face for longer than recommended because it can irritate sensitive skin. I've noticed that the area of skin around my nose gets red and itchy if I leave it on for too long. I really like it though.
customer_reviews.author: Lori D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin in winter, so I was looking for a mask to help with that, and this one is perfect! It smells so good, and feels nice and refreshing whenever I use it (I do also store it in cool/cold places so that it stays that way). Highly recommend if you have dry skin or just want to treat yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: To read the instructions, and to use it at night.
customer_reviews.text: It was the first time to use moisture for my skin, little nervous for the first time. But after using multiple times, it felt so nice. It seriously took care of my skin. To use it correctly helps you. I mean at first I washed my face after like 7mins, a bit earlier and couldn't feel any big changes. Instead, I should have kept it for at least 10mins so it dries then it is better to wash. In general, it helped me a lot to look nice and clean in skin. Thank you guys, I love it!!! Highly recommend guys to try at least once.
customer_reviews.author: Nurillo

customer_reviews.title: It cleans your pores wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I had a pimple or clogged pore that I’ve had for at least 20 years but it didn’t have a head. Used this mask for a month and now I popped it and you can’t even tell it was there. It also makes your skin so soft
customer_reviews.author: B A F

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but just another mask
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try to combat the small whiteheads I get on my forehead from time to time. I use it a couple of times a week after removing make up and it definitely makes my skin smoother and appear flatter on the forehead area. I haven't seen a huge improvement with the whiteheads which aren't extremely noticeable, but my skin feels cleaner and softer after using each time.
customer_reviews.author: LittleBob

customer_reviews.title: DONT USE!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had clear great skin but wanted a mask just to “brighten” my skin after a night of heavy makeup. After 3 uses I stopped using this product - I started getting breakouts once a week. As soon as I stopped my skin began to clear up right away. I would not recommend this mask at all - you’ll have better luck making your own at home
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: I love masks, and this sounded natural. It tends to dry my face after the use because of the exfoliating factor, so I tend to use this at night for my face to no longer be dry, and I don't use it often in winter. Overall, enjoyable experience.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Hamlet

customer_reviews.title: Burned/Peeling
customer_reviews.text: Although I followed the directions saying "leave on for 5 minutes " my skin began to tingle and burn after 2. I IMMEDIATELY rinsed this off my face. Unfortunately not only didnit dry my skin out, but it has made it rough to the touch and is peeling.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: This Dead Sea Mud Mask is the best mask I've ever purchased (and trust me I've purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: This Dead Sea Mud Mask is the best mask I've ever purchased (and trust me I've purchased a lot of masks that have ended up to be a cheat). I love this mask it works so well for acne. You won't regret this purchase. If you've been looking for a mask STOP you've found it. I've been using this mask for months and purchased it twice it has done wonders for my complexion. Order this mask NOW! You have no idea what your missing. Thank you MAJESTIC PURE!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great product even for sensitive inflamed skin!
customer_reviews.text: This mask is great. You need a thick layer but it doesn’t take much product to do that so you get a lot of bang for your buck! I am very hesitant of putting anything new on my face but I decided to give this mask a try and it helped smooth my face and make it so very soft! The smell of the mask is not bad either, some can be very off putting. You do need to let it dry more than 5 minutes to get the true effects of the exfoliating although you will find it is worth it! Overall a great buy👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: tasha floyd

customer_reviews.title: This revised version works as well as the one in the previous packaging.
customer_reviews.text: This revised version works as well as the previous version. The scent is quite strong. I found that if you put a thin primer coat, then add a second thicker coat on that it applies much better. The primer coat dries up some skin oil which makes it easier to apply the second coat. This product works well for my (male) combination skin.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Very acceptable product for cleaning skin.
customer_reviews.text: Living in Mississippi, the humidity is horrible year around. I find my skin oily constantly. I wanted a product that would help with cleaning my pores yet not be so harsh as to strip all the moisture from my skin. After using this product, my skin felt clean. Pores were certainly smaller and skin was smoother. This product does not over dry my medium type of skin. Seems like this product can be used daily without any negative affects or skin breaking out.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Minimizes pores
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about getting this because it has soooo many reviews. Three of us with very different skin types tried it out on the same night. Two of us have sensitive skin, it didn’t irritate our skin at all! Yay! It does minimize pores but you don’t get that refreshing feeling that (maybe it’s just me) I would’ve imagined it to have. I’m totally willing to try this mask on for a couple of weeks and see the results though.
customer_reviews.author: Ana LC

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased by the look, well see the results later on
customer_reviews.text: WIFE WRITING THE REVIEW : even though a number of comments were negative( from a couple Years ago) , I still ordered it, and it looks exactly like on the picture, has a mild plesant smell, overall I'm happy, I'll see if it actually improves the skin
customer_reviews.author: Aaron / Adel

customer_reviews.title: Sold!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok ok I'm into it. I purchased this product in October of 2015, product is still going strong and definitely helps to improve the skin. I have a very senstive face and after trying many different products and pairings of moisturizer and cleansers, I can say with confidence that this mask works! I recently suffered a bad break out from using one of those pre packaged masks( animal mask, panda brightening), it calmed my skin and helped repair it! So to make a long story, anyone who suffers from sensitive..dry..oily..and yada yada skin.... it's worth a shot and definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Takes Longer Than 5 Minutes to Dry
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. It left my face feeling nice and tight. I tend to have normal to dry skin, and it left my face feeling a little dry afterwards, but after using my moisturizer like the instructions suggested, it was totally fine. The only negative comment I have to make is that the instructions say that it should take about 5 minutes to dry. It actually took more than 30 minutes, and it still wasn't completely dry.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product when you get the correct one.
customer_reviews.text: I love this masque when I'm sent the correct one. The jar with the silver lid is fantastic. It's thick and while it dries you can feel the skin tightening. But twice now and this includes my most recent order, I have been sent the jar with the black lid and this is crap. It is extremely thin and does not make my face feel cleansed and refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon O'Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Best mud mask!
customer_reviews.text: I had really bad eczema so I don't use many products on my skin because some products can cause serious skin irritation after reading the reviews on this mud mask I decided to try it my product came fast I tested it out on my arm no irritation I follow the I applied a thin layer of mask it works better for me after the first application my skin felt so soft and smooth before I even applied the moisturizer the second application by blemishes started to dissappear I really love this mud mask I can't wait to finish this jar I'm definitely gonna purchase more I'm very happy with product and results I'm getting. ☺
customer_reviews.author: Frances A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I used it and found my skin felt pretty dry after, but not in the scaley, white, traditional sense. It felt tight and smooth and felt like all the oil had been sucked out. My skin is already dry so I wasn’t sure what to think. I avoided putting any moisturizer on so I could get the full effect, and the next day my face actually felt great. It’s normally super dry but this mask apparently drew out my natural oils and I was pleasantly surprised. Dry skin is very hard to deal with and this mask worked wonders! Highly recommended for fellow dry-facers.
customer_reviews.author: kalley snodgrass

customer_reviews.title: Great product to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is fun and easy to use. This no stirring or shaking. You just apply and let it dry and then wipe off. I add a moisturizer lotion after each use so I don’t see any dryness of the skin. There is a lot in the container, so it goes a long way. Not really much of an odor to it
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: My skin feels smooth after using this product. It ...
customer_reviews.text: My skin feels smooth after using this product. It wasn't very expensive, and it is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Not in a glass jar.
customer_reviews.text: I try really hard to buy quality products that aren't harmful to the earth. I was really excited when I found this since it is cruelty-free and seemed to be in a glass jar. I've come to be very disappointed when I received the item to find out that it was actually in a plastic jar! Glass is infinitely recyclable, easier to recycle than plastic, and is overall better. The jar looks cheap and the product isn't that great. Looks like something I could've bought on the clearance rack at TJ Maxx.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsti owings

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this mask
customer_reviews.text: This mud mask was great! It goes on so easy and smooth. Feels nice and cool when you apply it and doesn't make your skin feel tight when it's drying. Washed off very easily and my skin felt softer and makeup applied a lot smoother after using it. I will definitely buy this again. It arrived quick and the seller was great! I would definitely check out more of their products!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Crout

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. It can dry out your skin if you don’t use moisturizer, but after 2-3 applications I am already seeing smaller pores. My boyfriend has even started using it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice.
customer_reviews.text: It was super smooth and It was relaxing to sit with it on because it was definitely cooling and detoxing, the formula is very thick so I had to use a towel to wipe it off but overall I will be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kern Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Works well, clearer skin
customer_reviews.text: A family friend recommended this to my mom and I bought it for the family to use. It has made my face feel cleaner, and after about 2 uses I noticed that my complexion from acne scars was clearing up. This mask along with the Aztec Secret Indian Clay Mask are the best I've tried so far from Amazon. This one is easier to use than the Indian Clay. I would recommend that you use toner after this. My toner is Thayer's Rosewater toner
customer_reviews.author: Braddah

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Just got this. Exfoliated and washed my first then followed the directions. My skin feels so soft and hydrated right now. Very impressed. I have super sensitive skin that has been prone to some odd break outs lately. Really happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Kielha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: It work great I can't even see my pores that much anymore. Has help with my acne. Love that it doesn't leave my face dry. I still have a lot left. Worth to Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Newer Batches may be watery
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through 3 or 4 of these and always had good results. The recent batch I ordered was very watery and the mud would not stick to my face like the previous batches did. I either got a bad batch(lot 910MP-DSM) or it went bad faster than its expiration date(9/10/17). It was stored in a cool dark place and it is simply not usable now. It takes forever to dry, it applies on thin and isnt what my previous purchases were.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Follow easy instructions. My skin has never felt so soft after doing a mud mask. It doesn’t smell bad at all. It has such a great smell to it. Love this product! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Don671

customer_reviews.title: Really gets pores cleaned out!
customer_reviews.text: This clay mask has a pretty strong floral is scent. It doesn't stink, but the fragrance is a bit loud. Other than that...this product does a fantastic job of clearing gunk out of pores without drying your skin out. I've found that it takes longer than the 5 minutes the directions state in order for it to dry completely. I'd say it takes closers to 15, which isn't a big deal. I slather it on before my morning shower, brush my teeth, shave my legs, then hop in the shower and rinse...WA LA! Brand new and shiny me...
customer_reviews.author: kimberly mackay

customer_reviews.title: I have psoriasis and this helped so much
customer_reviews.text: So I was looking for a good face mask because my skin was starting to break out and when i was looking at good masks, i found this one. I didnt give it much thought but then an article said this mask helped alot with psoraisis. Of course I immediately bought it and in two weeks I began to put on the mask twice a week on my spots and then I put on my psoraisis cream, the psoraisis spots on my left elbow are are slowly fading and the skin isnt flaky anymore. Will buy over and over and over
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even dry! Not a good mask at all.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even dry!!!! The mask didn’t dry even if I left on much longer than the indicated time (5 mins) - I left on for 30 mins and still didn’t dry. I just didn’t feel any different post cleaning even after a few attempts. I have never had this issue with any other mud mask I’ve used in the past. Do not bother buying
customer_reviews.author: hp

customer_reviews.title: The only thing he doesn't like about it (well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 14-year-old son since nothing seems to help his acne. Even using it just once a week, his skin has improved greatly without drying it out. The only thing he doesn't like about it (well, besides being 14, male, and being horrified by doing a facial mask) is that it is extremely cold when applied. The only thing I don't like about it is that when he washes it off in the shower, it splatters everywhere and sticks to the sides of the shower walls. So, we gave him a cup to rinse down the walls when he is done.
customer_reviews.author: AppleGeek

customer_reviews.title: This product is great!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife used this product, and her face felt amazing. The directions are easy to follow, and the end result was great. It says to apply a thick coat of the product on your face, and I felt like we used less product than we thought. The only thing that I did not like was the product was shipped in an envelope. This caused the top of the product to have a small dent in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No dry skin here!
customer_reviews.text: This mud mask left my face feeling very soft and moisturized. The combination of oils and extracts helps to combat dry skin especially during the colder months. Even though the directions say to leave on for about 5 minutes, I left the mask on until it was completely dry and then rinsed with warm water. I plan to do this 2x week for the rest of the winter!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF IS ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how well this works and feels!!! Definitely, a must have!!! My pores went from crater size to almost invisible in less than a week!! I also don't have to constantly scrub, exfoliate, squeeze and pinch my pores clean anymore either!! THANK YOU MAJESTIC PURE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product once since I received. I will use as recommended and will be able to provide a more accurate review
customer_reviews.author: neusch

customer_reviews.title: New favorite face mask
customer_reviews.text: The product is creamy and easy to spread on to your face. It worked better than some other face masks I have tried and didn’t leave my face feeling dry or irritated. Will be purchasing again once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: To each their own
customer_reviews.text: It's stated that it's a pore minimizer and honestly i haven't even noticed a difference with using this about 4 times now. i use it every 2/3 days. I was hoping it also would help with black heads but i find myself scrubbing my face because i feel as if i have a residue left over. I use moisturizers and toners daily so i was hoping to add this to my daily/weekly regimen but i'm going to have to pass on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsqueen12

customer_reviews.title: Clarifies the skin without drying it out
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best mud mask treatment I’ve ever tried. Most mud masks leave the skin feeling completely stripped and dried out. Not so with this one. The jojoba oil and other moisturizing ingredients really work to keep the skin soft while the mud absorbs extra oils and sebum. Skin feels super clean and clarified without being tight and dry. Great mask.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Woodbridge

customer_reviews.title: I have power over my acne
customer_reviews.text: This mask is SOOOOO AWESOME. The dead sea mud mask really killed a lot of my acne, and helped to closed my pores. My face isn't oily as it was before, and I get very few pimples from time to time. I started using this product in late September (in a month when it was hot) and even now (with a colder climate) this product has done great wonders for me. I have been dealing with acne ever since the 4th grade, and now at age 26 I really hope that I can have full control over my skin now.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine pipkins

customer_reviews.title: Great for pores
customer_reviews.text: Works great leaves skin soft and moisturized and minimized pores pleasant scent and easily spreads
customer_reviews.author: Keith and Nada

customer_reviews.title: but so far I like the results
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this twice, but so far I like the results. I have VERY sensitive skin, and most products don't work well. This one isn't bad. My face is a bit itchy and burns a bit when the mud is on, but after removing it (which I've had no problem with at all), and moisturizing, the itch and burn go away. My face is red after using it, but the next morning it's much better than it usually is, and it does seem to minimize pores. Good product - I will keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: VLP

customer_reviews.title: Nice product at good price.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My friend recommended this to me, My skin feels smoother and clean after using it. It doesn’t come with any tool to apply it on so I usually just use it with my bareMinerals mask smoothing brush.
customer_reviews.author: Renee L.

customer_reviews.title: Took me quite a while to peel it off
customer_reviews.text: I tried it twice after it arrived, it really took me a while to peel it off. Will keep you guys update if it gets any better later.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Like It
customer_reviews.text: Mud. Mask. Slimy. Smelly. Drippy. What's not to love? Beware though - it doesn't "set" too quickly and therefore drips a bit if it's too think in any given area. Don't wear anything you care about when you do the mask.
customer_reviews.author: OBrien

customer_reviews.title: African American Woman here....
customer_reviews.text: African American Woman here, and I have to say I absolutely LOVE this stuff. It slides on soooo smooth, they say to leave it on and then rinse off but I leave mine on for about and hour or 2 while I get ready for bed and tidy up. Washes off so easy. And the best thing is this stuff hardly flakes! I've used one in the past from a top name cosmetic brand - and the stuff was so dry smearing on, and never washed away completely. Skin is still glowing the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Mommy

customer_reviews.title: I love this Mud Mask i use it as a spot ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this Mud Mask i use it as a spot treatment as well as all over my face when I want to remove some of the oil. It keeps my skin soft and I have noticed an improvement overall in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the product worth every penny !!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got the package took 3 days to arrive, very pleased with the product, once I opened it the smell wasn't what I expected but it smells rather nice pleasant already have used it once and from my one time usage my face n skin felt so nice and vibrant and healthy can't wait to keep using it for better results I plan on using it 3x a week with my fiancé who also enjoyed the feeling if having nice healthy skin, thank you for this product worth the money and more !
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am so satisfied with this purchase. I have it to my nieces for Christmas as part of a "beauty package". They BOTH called me to tell me how soft it made their skin, and how it have them a fresh glow. They were beyond thrilled with it.m
customer_reviews.author: Paula Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Good price for this reel
customer_reviews.text: First time using this kind of face mask, it doesn't feel like a regular face mask makes you feel more Moisturizing than normal, just don't feel that much, try couple more times to see what's going on.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: amazing stuff
customer_reviews.text: so i buy alot of different masks, but lately have been intrigued by the research i did into dead sea minerals and such. Keep in mind i have extremely sensitive skin as well, and with a poor product i easily get red skin or rashes etc. This is by far the best mask i have ever purchased. It has actually taken away the red patches on my face, made my skin feel 20 times cleaner and much smoother. My acne has also disappeared. A little goes a long way i definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: gillian young

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: So I received this face mask today and immediately had to try it, oh my god I am in love, my face feels like it's breathing after such a long time, I feel like it's cleaned out so much of the makeup i've had stuffed in my pores for years it's really refreshing and the smell is just wonderful, I truly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kiana

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend!
customer_reviews.text: When I put it on my face it feels like butter. It does not smell bad or like if it has chemicals. After using it makes my face feels lighter and more cleansed
customer_reviews.author: jain r.

customer_reviews.title: but if that is the benchmark for how wonderful my skin is going to look and feel after ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product only once so far, but if that is the benchmark for how wonderful my skin is going to look and feel after multiple uses, I will be thrilled! Very simple and easy to use. It doesn't have a bad smell or anything weird. Goes on simply and it's kinda cool how it just peels right off with rubbing. It does make a bit of a mess in the sink though! But, I just love the results and look forward to using it again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: OUcat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! I have oily skin and have tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! I have oily skin and have tried NUMEROUS products for my black heads! I was about to see a dermatologist but decided to try this first! Wow!! Amazing!! I am so shocked as I don't write reviews often and am not one to believe "advertising" Highly reccomdned this! I'll be buying more!! Forever I'll be using this!!
customer_reviews.author: Seattle_Arizona

customer_reviews.title: More fun putting it on than seeing any results
customer_reviews.text: The texture is a good slimy so it was more fun putting it on than anything. It burns initially putting it on (which doesnt last) but after use, maybe the next day or two, it seemed to make new acne appear which I dont enjoy. Overall, not seeing any improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I keep trying new ones in hopes of minimizing my pores/clearing blackheads and I've been really pleased with this mask
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and lots of products make my skin break out. However, I keep trying new ones in hopes of minimizing my pores/clearing blackheads and I've been really pleased with this mask. I haven't used it consistently, so it's hard to tell if it's getting rid of blackheads, but a) it doesn't irritate my skin and b) my skin feels amazing after I use this stuff! So soft and clean feeling.
customer_reviews.author: C. George

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: First time using this product. Skin is soft but not sure if it’s cleaning well - time will tell
customer_reviews.author: somaya

customer_reviews.title: This feels really good on the skin
customer_reviews.text: This feels really good on the skin, and my skin is smoother and clearer afterwards. I also like how it serves as a scrub when you're washing it off. I think my skin came out brighter as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the same product months later and the mud was different
customer_reviews.text: It seems that the company that provides this mud mask is trying to save money by adding a ton of water to the mud. When I bought it in 2015 the mud was rich and thick. But when I bought it in 2016 it was completely different. There was no scent and the mud was soaking in water and was no longer thick. If I could contact the seller I would. I will attempt to order again but I will return it if it comes soaked in water.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: I like t his mask
customer_reviews.text: Oh, I like t his mask. it makes my pores look a little smaller and it makes my skin feel soft. I like that after five minutes, it is still moist and you just massage it with wet hands and then rinse it off. I used this a few times a week. it feels great. this I would buy again when I am out. I recommend using a clean spatula instead of dipping your fingers into the jar to keep the product clean.
customer_reviews.author: VL

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t do anything
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t do anything , I don't know where so many positive reviews come from
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I have big pores on my nose and the sides of my nose, and with just a couple of uses, they're disappearing!! I'm so happy with this product, and it makes my skin feel really soft after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Asma

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, plan on having a lot of time to spend waiting for it to dry
customer_reviews.text: I do like the way this mask feels but I am confused as to why it takes so so long to dry. The first time I used it i didn’t let it dry enough I guess because it was still creamy and wet on my skin and it take a little while every time. Seems weird.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly, Wonderful Product!!! Best my skin has EVER been!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this now three times. My skin has never been softer. I have ALWAYS had larger pores on my nose. This has been a trouble spot for me since I was a teen. With just three uses, my pores are noticeably smaller. Some are even hard to see!! My skin feels refreshed and impeccably clean after using this mask. I hve already recommended it to all my friends. I am now going to try it on my stretch marks to see how it works on those!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Mask
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mask , I have sensitive skin and it was very soothing, skin feels great after , I definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Violet Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell you how much I love this mask. After just one use I can tell my skin was glowing. I have a problem with acne scars, And this perfect mask helps feed them and get rid of my existing acne while making my skin luminous
customer_reviews.author: stephanie abrams

customer_reviews.title: Works well for men too.
customer_reviews.text: It cleanses face well. Follow directions, for best results wash face with soap and water to remove excessive oil and dirt before applying mask. Wash mask off after 5 minutes, then use a quality face cream like Nivea. Relatively small amount is needed each time, so jar should last ~ 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: sirnatesalot

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: How the heck did they make mud smell like foofy perfume? Terrible. Sent it back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Arrowina

customer_reviews.title: At home spa day
customer_reviews.text: I love this face mask it was so easy to use and it smelled good. My skin was so soft afterwards I would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Cute jar. Easy to apply. I felt a weird sensation on my face the whole time (not uncomfortable nor comfortable sensation) but it wasn’t a big deal. It was kinda hard to take off with water so I suggest doing so in the shower. Overall it left my skin super soft and extracted some of the blackheads on my nose which are SUPER tough to get rid of normally.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: I love how this dries on my skin and the way ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how this dries on my skin and the way it minimizes my pores after I wash it off I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skin left feeling amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Last Christmas I bought for my wife a face scrub from the same company which she loved. So I figured this Christmas I would stick with a product from a company I know is quality. She used this for the first time the other day and said she really enjoyed how her skin felt after the mask was removed. I am not really into face masks or beauty products so I will take her word on it and buy it again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Billybob

customer_reviews.title: found my mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! I don't use a lot mask because I don't use it often when I buy them but this particular one I do! I use this twice a week. It dries pretty fast. I leave it on for about 20mins. I use this with my spa-x! I have dry face and this helps a lot with it! It doesn't smell which is a plus. It smells great! It goes on my skin smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: KoyLee00

customer_reviews.title: Gotta try it!!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a difference in my skin after one use. Love this will order more!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Moistens skin and quite easy to apply a thin spread without any build-up which ...
customer_reviews.text: Moistens skin and quite easy to apply a thin spread without any build-up which means you can get more out of a single container. I anticipate I may be able to stretch this out over 9 months. It leaves face with a radiant glow and the oils definitely gets rid off any dullness in appearance. I added an additional 10 mins to the drying time and received better results. Will not rate a 5 until I determine results are consistent. I've only been using the mask for 2-3 weeks now. I apply it twice a week and I have noticed an improvement in the radiance department. Definitely worth a try, but still not sure if it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: SuperShan

customer_reviews.title: great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I used this to help bring my dull skin back to life and I am so glad it worked really well, my skin looks great. This mask is great for dry skin... it is very moisturizing and it really helped clear up a lot of blemishes too
customer_reviews.author: Jett Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Reduced fine lines on face
customer_reviews.text: Mask smelled really good and felt very refreshing once it was on. Make sure to avoid your lips as I got it on mine and it felt like it burned a little. I definitely noticed a reduction in the appearance of fine lines on my forehead.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Fun to use and good for girls night - non irritating (for me) - High quality - Skin looks very soft after Cons: - required multiple layers to put on - took a sec to take it off (2-4 mins washing off) - My skin was somewhat dry after
customer_reviews.author: Mnm

customer_reviews.title: It's just OK
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Nice smelling mud like mask that makes your face tingle. I applied a thinner layer than what the jar states. CONS: Don't get it near your eyes or under your eyes, it dries out the skin terribly. You can only keep it on for 5 minutes per the jar instructions. Not enough time for my liking to enjoy having it on.
customer_reviews.author: J. N. Pimental

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it really makes my skin feel clean and smooth. I will definetly purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Leaves your skin very soft but it is a bit difficult to wash off.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: nice skin mask
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this product two weeks ago on a biweekly basis. It has done a nice job keeping my skin really soft. The product has not irritated my skin at all and I have pretty sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Strausser

product_meta.title: MAJESTIC PURE Dead Sea Mud Mask - Natural Face and Skin Care for Women and Men - Best Black Facial Cleansing Clay for Blackhead, Whitehead, Acne and Pores - 8.8 fl. Oz
feature_bullets: Dead Sea Mud Mask; Pores, Blackheads, Whiteheads, Acne and Breakouts; Made with natural dead sea mud; Simply unique due to its high concentrations of salts and minerals known to help restoring a healthy rosy glow to the skin
Excellent anti aging skin care mask for men and women, deep pore cleansing, detoxifying and revitalization; Similar to Bentonite Clay, it makes a fabulous facial mask.

SAFETY WARNING: For external use only. Rub a very small amount on the inside of your elbow area to test for any allergic reaction before use, discontinue use if irritation occurs. Avoid contact with eyes, keep out of the reach of children. Must be followed by a moisturizer after use of the product. People with sensitive skin, should not use the product. If pregnant, consult with your health care provider before use.
Majestic Pure Natural Dead Sea Mud face Mask is cruelty free and not tested on animals
